amendment.description: To require a sequestration of certain direct spending.

vote.text: Amendment SA 929, under the order of 7/18/19, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 22 - 77. Record Vote Number: 223.

action.text: Amendment SA 929 proposed by Senator Paul. (consideration: CR S4996-4998; text: CR S4996) To require a sequestration of certain direct spending.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 929 proposed by Senator Paul.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 929, under the order of 7/18/19, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 22 - 77. Record Vote Number: 223.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 929, under the order of 7/18/19, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 22 - 77. Record Vote Number: 223.
